casebody.data:
Town of Beech Mountain
v.
Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc. 230A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Meagan I. Kiser, Attorney at Law, Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Attorney at Law, Boone, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Beech Mountain. Charles E. Clement, Attorney at Law, Boone, John J. Korzen, Attorney at Law, for Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc. Charles A. Brady, III, Attorney at Law, Boone.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of August 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
